name: Cube World (VERY EARLY IN DEV)
description:
Cube World, visit lands, make friends, and the rest is history. (VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT)

Things I hope I can add to this project:

  1. Fully working muiltiplayer.
  2. Maps and other lands to explore.
  3. Customizable cubes for players to design and make their own.

So yeah, this is not a finished project and I even labeled it as a development build because it just is.
